articles.description: The British designer, 37, told The Sunday Times she was silenced by certain fashion houses at the start of her career, who would 'borrow' her signature style but wanted her look on their 'terms'.
articles.content:
Alexa Chung has claimed she was silenced by certain fashion houses at the start of her career, claiming some days it was 'tricky' getting dressed.  
The British designer and model told The Sunday Ti… [+4799 chars]
